Html: I would just like to say that the Balance tree in Rawr needs an update for Balance of power, in Rawr it is still listed as the (2/2) 4% to hit and to reduced being hit by spells, while it was changed to (2/2) increases chance to hit by 6% with spells and reduces all spell damage taken by 6%.  This would make itemization a bit better as to not have to worry about hit rating or hit gems when you are already capped in the game. Thank you for your time :)
No, actually, it wasn't changed to 6%; it's a typo in live right now, that's fixed in 3.2.2; it doesn't actually give you 6%.
Oh, alright thank you, I was just curious as to why it was like that because I know rawr is usually very accurate for my characters.  Stupid blizz >
